key_risks: Supply chain disruptions, including semiconductor shortages and logistics delays
High competitive pressure in the technology distribution industry
Dependence on key vendors like Cisco, HP, and Microsoft
Sensitivity to macroeconomic conditions affecting technology investments
Legal disputes and potential risks in partner relationships
controversies: Settlement of a $15 million lawsuit with former channel partner Avanade
social_issues: Emphasis on ethical conduct and corporate social responsibility, requiring suppliers and partners to adhere to fair and ethical practices

sources.title: ScanSource settles dispute with former channel partner
sources.snippet: More than a year and a half after POS distributor ScanSource Inc. sued former channel partner Avanade Inc., the latter has agreed to pay $15 million in damages in a settlement that was not immediately announced.. ScanSource confirmed the settlement to CDN, which was outlined in its 10-K report filed with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) in late August.
